string.text: Sell this Brothel for {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}
Manage Brothel
Initial Capital
Assist the prostitutes at your brothel
Time to make you work at the brothel.
Of course {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}.
Anything else {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}? [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
I would like to manage our establishment.
The brothel of {SETTLEMENT} has been captured by the enemy, and has been requisitioned.
The brothel of {SETTLEMENT}

From the outside it looks inviting, warm and cozy. Stacked boulders and marble details make up most of the building's outer structure.{newline}It's near impossible to see through the large, stained glass windows, but the lack of sounds of cutlery and drinking glasses suggests it is empty inside.

From the outside it looks inviting, warm and cozy. Stacked boulders and marble details make up most of the building's outer structure.{newline}It's near impossible to see through the large, stained glass windows, but the sounds of cutlery and drinking glasses from within can be felt outside.
Daily Wages
Notable Prostitutes
Stop Operations
Start Operations
The brothel is currently {?ISRUNNING}open{?}closed, you will need {AMOUNT} denars to begin operations again{\?}.
The brothel of {SETTLEMENT} has gone bankrupted, and is no longer open.
The brothel of {SETTLEMENT} has gone bankrupted, and has been requisitioned.
You can sell this brothel for {AMOUNT} denars.
Brothel income.
Continue as you were.
Go take a break.
No, there is plenty of customers waiting, you must continue working.
Thank you {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}.
Hello {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}, I think I need a break.
I will like to have some fun.
Do you need something {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}? [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Sorry {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}, I am currently very busy.
What do you want? Cannot you see that I am trying to enjoy the whores here? [ib:normal][rb:unsure]
Uh, nevermind.
Yes? [ib:normal][rb:unsure]
Would you like my services for {AMOUNT} denars?
Well hello there you {?PLAYER.GENDER}fine whore{?}stud{\?}, would you like {AMOUNT} denars for your services? [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Yes, my lord I can do that.
Excuse me, I don't work here!
Sorry sir, I have to leave.
That's a fair price I'd say.
That's too much, no thanks.
Follow me sweetie. [ib:normal][rb:positive]
Stop wasting my time then.[ib:aggressive][rb:unsure]
Hey {?PLAYER.GENDER}beautiful{?}handsome{\?} want to have some fun? [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Yeah, I could go for a bit of refreshment.
No, I am fine.
Sounds good, that'll be {AMOUNT} denars. [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Hey {?PLAYER.GENDER}cutie{?}handsome{\?} you look like you need some companionship.[ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
I have been awfully lonely...
No thanks.
I'm sorry to hear that, let's change that tonight for {AMOUNT} denars. [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Is there something I can help you with this evening?[ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Yeah, I think you can help me with the problem I'm having.
Maybe later.
Perfect, my \"treatment\" costs {AMOUNT} denars for a full dose.[ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Sounds like my kind of cure.
You know, my condition isn't that bad.
Let's go to the doctor's office so you can be treated.[ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
See ya around.[ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
What do you want?[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
I'd like your services for the evening.
Fine, but it's going to be {AMOUNT} denars up front.[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
Very well.
That's a bit too much.
Right this way...[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
Thank goodness...[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
Is there something you want?[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
How much for your time?
Not as this moment.
Ok well... {AMOUNT} denars sounds about right.[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
Alright, here you go.
Follow me to the back.[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
Oh, a valued customer, how can I help you today?[ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
I would like to buy your establishment.
I don't need anything at the moment.
I am selling this establishment for {AMOUNT} denars.
A pleasure doing business. [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Very well, I'll be here if you need anything. [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Let me prepare the establishment, it will be ready for you soon.
Hello {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}, how can I help you today?[ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
I would like to sell our establishment.
We can sell this establishment for {AMOUNT} denars.
It's been a pleasure working for you! [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
The new owner will arrive here shortly, I will just clean up things for now.
Well perhaps you should, you sure look like a {?PLAYER.GENDER}whore{?}prostitute{\?}!
My apologies, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}!
This is no place for me, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}! What do you want?[ib:closed][rb:unsure]
I would like to purchase some services for my party.
Send some ladies to boost the morale of my party.
Yes, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?} I will send her first.
Sorry, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?} everyone are currently busy.
I can bring some ladies but that will be {AMOUNT} denars.
Who would you like to send first?
Send {NAME} the regular.
Send {HERO.LINK}.
Thank you {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}!
Would you like something to drink, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}?
I recommend the mead, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}. Finished brewing just this morning. We also have ale and wine.
I recommend the wine, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}. These last few bottles've been quite popular among the other patrons. We also have ale and mead.
I am looking for something to drink. What do you have?
I'm looking for someone specific.
Looking for someone specific? I'm sure your assistant will be happy to direct you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}.
Looking for someone specific? I'm sure the owner will be happy to direct you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}.
Yes, what would you recommend?
I will have the mead.
I will have the wine.
Care for a mug of fresh ale, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}? We also have mead and wine.
I will have the ale.
That will be {AMOUNT} denars. [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
Would you like something else to drink, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}?
That will be {AMOUNT} denars for the whole party. [ib:confident][rb:very_positive]
That will be that be for the whole party? [rb:very_positive]
Yes, for everyone in my party.
No, just for me.
Hello {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}, what can I get for you?
You cut a fine figure, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}my lord{\?}. What can I get for you?
I would like to upgrade our establishment.
We can upgrade this establishment for {AMOUNT} denars.
Yes, milady I can do that.
Sorry milady, I have to leave.
Prostitute Capacity
Regular Prostitutes
